page.title: 20Blooming Business.
page.content: Daphne Ledward is our most famous villager. She is a well-known broadcaster and gardening celebrity, appearing regularly on Radio Four's Gardeners' Question Time and BBC TV's Gardeners' Direct Line. { When she came to Little Thatch, her charming thatched cottage, four years ago, her garden was a poor little plot, dull and lacking in interest. Since then she has worked hard to produce a garden worthy of showing to the public. Every little corner is crammed with plants of ever description. In July, she will entertain many visitors who will pay 50p each to view the garden in aid of Cancer Research Daphne started her career writing stories for romantic magazines before going on to write for gardeners. P. Hall
